code_General.connections.mailer¶

Module Contents¶

Classes¶

KissMailer

later add some other stuff and configuration things as well as perhaps a html template.
class code_General.connections.mailer.KissMailer¶

later add some other stuff and configuration things as well as perhaps a html template. for now just send a mail via default django smtp sendmail

sendmail(to, subject, message)¶
Parameters:

  • self (KissMailer) – mailer object

  • to (str) – recipient email address (1 only)

  • subject (str) – subject of the mail

  • message (str) – message of the mail

Returns:

number of sent emails or False on failure

Return type:

int or bool
